Игра скиллозависимая и одновременно рандомная, много разных персонажей, много перков, хоть и многие либо бесполезны, либо работают только в связке. Как лично заметил, разрабы стали обновлять перки, карты и т.п, поэтому остаётся только ждать результата конечного. Не смотря на это всё, игру я рекомендую к покупке. И ещё, не слушайте тех, кто говорят, что в одиночке без друзей играть нериально, это реально, просто так сложнее, да и подбор игроков по рейтингу страдает пока. Лично часто бегаю в соло и можно просто запомнить, что надеяться стоит только на себя.

非常好玩的游戏，我主要玩人去体验刺激的感觉，玩鬼的话我舍不得砍伤人（心太软）。我的总游戏时间887小时，差一个小时就888了，这最后一个小时我选择用来学习。账号所有人物满级。2022年2月3号（大年初三）告别此游戏。。。。。。

While I do have some general grumblings about this game, it's far more about the way players go about their games and play styles than anything that's wrong with the game itself. It's fluid, not too hard to learn, and generally a decent time. It's the other players that can ruin it for you.

Update:  My review remains the same, except I will note that there are some ways to deal with toxic players. It doesn't make the match any real fun, but at least you can scrape something out of it.

I really like DBD. It was my first "horror" game, and it quickly became one of my favorite games as both killer and survivor. There is a bit of a learning curve for both, and it can be really frustrating because of of the toxicity. While not every game is like that, many are. I do recommend this game as long as you don't take it too seriously and are able to have fun with it.

This game has its ups and down, some of the perks are unbalanced both on the killer and survivor side. If you want the best experience definitely play it with friends! having a 5 stack go against a killer is really really fun for us the survivors but painful for the killer, almost making the killer hook himself (DC) 7.2/10

Really fun. Obviously has its flaws which I'm sure you'll find pointed out by many other reviews here, but I can't undersell how the gameplay, primarily, has kept me playing through all the shit matches. During my time playing Survivor (which, admittedly, was always a Survive With Friends group) I enjoyed a majority of my matches; not all ended in wins mind you, but nonetheless, a fun experience versus the right killer. Unfortunately the same cannot be said for solo survivor, which during my short-term experience,  was filled with more frustration and loathing than fun. I hope more is done to address the severe shift in difficulty for both killers and survivors depending on whether or not the team is a SWF or not (changing / adding mechanics that would aid solo survivors - is there any reason they shouldn't be able to communicate more? Is a "point" and "follow me" gesture really all that's necessary for a game about cooperation?).

Killer gameplay has always stood out to me - you can have some really, really fun matches even without getting wins but its entirely dependent on the survivor team you get. The stories about toxic teams are all too true; you will definitely encounter plenty of very uncooperative and rude players who are only there to try to spoil the fun for everyone. This not only makes the game worse for Killer but, provided it is a solo team, means that the other teammates will be effectively missing a member as they throw themselves into your face all the time. 

Unfortunate decisions by the developer means that the game in "high-rank" areas has a ridiculous amount of Survivors who will most often (and, logically, by all means) utilise the most sought-after, "meta" perks - causing the gameplay for Killer to become stale, furthered by the heightened levels of toxicity in higher ranks. This has come to a conclusion where there is a clear, distinct part of the player base that downright refuse to play as the Killer for the aforementioned reasons; meaning Survivors make up majority of the population on this game.

Worth a purchase onsale, definitely. But please, try out both playstyles and, above all - just try to have fun. You don't have to win all the time.

I never thought I would like a "scary" game like this one but soon after playing, I became quickly addicted.  It's not just about running around as a survivor and fixing generators or running around as a killer and hooking survivors.  There are daily challenges to complete, achievements to accomplish, and the monthly grind of "how much can I improve my rank".  You can choose to play with friends or play with random people.  You really never get bored because you can change your perks to give yourself a challenge or heck, you can run perkless to make things even more interesting.  The many maps and variety of characters make each game different.  I swore I would NEVER play this game and look at me now, over 1,000 hours in and I am STILL loving it.

Listen, I have 300+ hours in this game but I cant seriously recommend it to anyone. Its currently in a bad state and I would hold off on buying this game for anyone who has been thinking about it. It has too many problems to list, Campers, tunnelers, Toxic community, no true ranking system so people with 2000+ hours are being put with people who installed 10 minutes ago, they took away the system that basically stopped this from happening but then replaced it with a new shittier version that doesn't mean anything skill or rank wise. The solution to these problems is quite easy but the devs dont care. Not to mention the hacker problem.

Have you ever wanted to feel as if you're two seconds away from having a panic attack and pissing yourself? Have you ever wanted to feel like a ruthless serial killer, unbounded by the morality of conventional society? Or do you just want to have a good time? Whichever accurately sums up what you want, this game is for you! It's fun, strategy-based (mostly coughcoughcough), and is scary enough to validate the survival horror tag's existence in the game description! A must-have for people who have friends, but lack a strong enough attachment to them to not want them dead. Buy it. All jokes aside, it's fun. :)

まず初めに、一緒に遊んでくれるフレンドがいないなら買うな。サバイバー（逃げる側）にしろキラー（追う側）にしろとんでもなく苦労する。
フレンドがいない前提のレビューになるが、サバイバーを一人でやると様々な要因からやる気を削がれる事態に陥る。
一番はマッチングに平気で５分近くかかる事があげられる。友達と喋りながら待っているのならまだましだが、これを一人でただただ待機画面で待たされるとかなり苦痛になる。たまにじゃなく毎回だからね？
現状ゲーム内ボイチャ機能がないから一人きり野良だと味方との意思疎通が制限されるため「あ、こいつ下手だな見捨てよ・囮にしよ」なんてことになるのは、ほかのサバイバーからすれば自分が生き残るために必要な選択になってくる。だから最初のうちは長いマッチング時間から即死亡……なんてことはしょっちゅうある。これにめげずにゲームを続けるのはちょっと難しい。一緒になってやってくれる友達がいるならだいぶましだが。
で、一番問題なのがキラー側。ゲームバランスが著しく悪い現状では初心者はやるな。やらない方がいいんじゃなくてやるな。サバイバーが凄く下手糞そ集団じゃない限り負ける。ルールを理解してない相手じゃなきゃ負ける。何ならちゃんとルールを理解してない相手にも負ける。
それぐらい酷い。少し調べればいくらでも情報が出てくると思うがサバイバー有利な調整が多すぎるから（上手い人が使うと）強いキラーを使って（一部の強パークを使わなきゃ対等にすらならないので）テンプレに近いパーク構成で挑んでようやく戦えるレベル。それでも負けますが。

まだまだ不満は書けますが、これだけは言いたい。
他に楽しめるゲームは山のようにあるので、これはやらない方がいいと思います。

それでもこのゲームが気になる！って方はまずどこの実況者さんでもいいんで動画見ましょう。今なら初心者講座的な動画は腐るほどあるんで。発電機も回さずしゃがんでるだけの奴は害悪のごみ野郎くらい覚えとけばサバイバーは遊べます。
キラーは何にも考えず最初に見つけたやつを追い続ければ多分殺せるので、発電機の見回りとか固めるとか、キャンプとかトンネルとかそんなこと考えなくていいのでとりあえず一人殺しましょう。そのうちこれじゃダメだって気付いて、立ち回りを意識するでしょう。意識できるようになったらあとは回数重ねるだけです。キラーは慣れ。

I've played way more than I should ever have. Toxic community, terrible balancing issues between survivors and killers, devs are absolutely out of touch with the playerbase with what they want or how to improve the game.

Игра в принципе своих денег стоит.  Рекомендую. Классная игра для компании, очень круто будет в первые 150 часов игры, потому что атмосфера давит (музыка, крики и.д.), страх что маньяк тебя настигнет))) от доната не зависит. Все самое главное из топа можно купить за игровую валюту, за исключением некоторых персонажей и сетов. Читеров сравнительно не много.

Quite fun, but hard to recommend to anyone that doesn't like pvp games. The game features multiple killers from different films, but you need to buy those separately. The core game itself is very fun, but again, it's hard to recommend to anyone that get's turned off by micro transactions.

Pros:
+Can be fun with friends.

+TrU3Ta1ent, not Otzdarva, Puppers, Monto, etc, are really good Youtubers/Streamers and are actually very entertaining to watch despite the game that they're playing and making content for is utter dogshit.

Reasons to avoid and never play or give these fuckasses your money:
-Somehow has an even worse community than League of fucking Legends. Trust me, I've played both for hundreds of hours unfortunately.

-The Devs refuse to listen to their community or content creators in the slightest, and any valid criticism leveled at them is responded to with a reference from that one Simpsons episode where they told their fans to fuck off.

-They continue to ruin the quality and balance of their game with every new patch. They found a way to actually make it unfun whether you're playing as a survivor or a killer, not sure how they managed it but they did.

-Also like LoL, they keep adding a shit ton of skins and INVEST INTO FUCKING NFTs! THAT IS NOT A FUCKING JOKE, THEY TOOK ALL THE MONEY FROM A DLC AND USED IT TO FUND THAT BULLSHIT WITHOUT TELLING THEIR FANBASE UNTIL AFTER THEY DID IT. (Couldn't even vote with your wallet if you didn't want to support that shit because they straight up didn't tell you that's what they were gonna use the money for, instead of you know, using it to improve the game and pay employees?)

-List goes on, but at this point all other reasons either stem from, or are subcategories within the previous reasons listed as to why this game fucking sucks ass.

Fuck you Behaviour, I hope your company goes bankrupt and the servers for this horrible game are shut down so I can finally get some sleep at night knowing a good thing finally happened in the hellscape that is the gaming industry.

По началу было действительно страшно играть в эту игру. Атмосфера, звуки, погони без оглядки, а в дальнейшем игра становилась веселее) То есть, нет никакого страшного момента, со временем он исчезает, а убийцы, порой на них смотреть больно))) Со временем понимаешь, что разработчики этой игры не пытались как-то сделать эту игру страшной, тут совсем всё наоборот.
В целом, игра хорошая и в неё действительно весело играть с друзьями. Может тут нет глубокого лора и каких-то сюжетных линий, но может быть, когда-нибудь разработчики придумают что-то новое и интересное для этой игры)))
